comment._content: mystuart and swanq: Thanks for the further information on this colorful pair! Thanks to a comment on the other photo of this pair taken at the same time, I looked further into it and found that according to the Feb. 8, 1916 issue of the The Sun, this photo and the other similar one were taken at City Hall when they were getting their marriage license on Feb, 7, 1916, in preparation for their wedding Feb. 8, 1916. We will add the details you tracked down and this information to the records.
